release dates: USA::8 April 2012                            (Los Angeles Web Series Festival)
locations: New York City, New York, USA::(studio) (television studio)
imdb.plot outline: 17 characters. 8 dramas. 7 webisodes. Sometimes life will make you do things you never thought you would do. Dramatic multi-camera soap opera CHOICES shows characters from all walks of life who are somehow connected to each other... as we all are. CHOICES is about the options life puts before us and the decisions we make along the way. Life is a series of CHOICES.
